Question: Roush CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Roush

2024 Roush Super Duty

- 6.7L turbo-diesel V8 engine
- Roush dual-tipped performance DPF-back exhaust system
- Roush/Fox 2.0 performance suspension system
- 35-inch General Tire Grabber A/TX all-terrain tires and 20-inch satin black Roush wheels
- Color-matched fender flares with integrated accent lighting
- Roush Ready Package with steel Console Vault and Roush Off-Road Utility Kit
- 3-year, 36,000-mile limited warranty
Summary_cn:
Roush

2024 Roush Super Duty

- 6.7L 涡轮增压柴油V8 发动机
- Roush 双喷口性能DPF后排排气系统
- Roush / Fox 2.0 性能悬挂系统
- 35 英寸 General Tire Grabber A/TX 全地形轮胎和 20 英寸哑光黑 Roush 轮毂
- 色配接合悬挂灯的车宽轮拱
- Roush Ready 套件包括钢制中央储物保险硬箱和 Roush 越野工具套装
- 3年、36,000英里有限保修
